entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 5:22AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...HEAT WAVE LIKELY THIS WEEKEND INTO EARLY NEXT WEEK... Widespread hot temperatures are expected this weekend with highs in the 70s into the 80s for much of Southeast Alaska. Starting Monday and continuing through the first half of the week, some locations of the Inner Channels could reach upper 80s with a few registering 90 degrees or hotter. entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 6:52AM PDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...FIRST HEAT WAVE OF 2022 EXPECTED SATURDAY THROUGH MONDAY... After an unusually cool and wet spring, a rapid warm-up is expected late this week, with temperatures peaking Saturday through Monday across western Washington. Most lowland and mountain valley locations will see temperatures peaking in the 80s to around 90 degrees by Sunday.
